csw:Record.dc:title: Sea level daily gridded data from satellite observations for the Mediterranean Sea from 1993 to 2020
csw:Record.dc:subject: Oceanographic geographical features
Temporal coverage: Past
Spatial coverage: Europe
Product type: Satellite observations
Variable domain: Ocean (physics)
Provider: Copernicus C3S
oceans
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
Sea level anomaly is the height of water over the mean sea surface in a given time and region. In this dataset sea level anomalies are computed with respect to a twenty-year mean reference period (1993-2012). Up-to-date altimeter standards are used to estimate the sea level anomalies with a mapping algorithm specifically dedicated to the Mediterranean Sea. The steady number of reference satellite used in the production of this dataset contributes to the long-term stability of the sea level record. Improvements of the accuracy, sampling of meso-scale processes and of the high-latitude coverage were achieved by using a few additional satellite missions. This dataset includes uncertainties for each grid cell. More details about the sea level retrieval, additional filters, optimisation procedures, and the error estimation are given in the Documentation section.
Variables in the dataset/application are: Absolute dynamic topography, Absolute geostrophic velocity meridian component, Absolute geostrophic velocity zonal component, Geostrophic velocity anomalies meridian component, Geostrophic velocity anomalies zonal component, Sea level anomaly
csw:Record.dc:description:

dc:URI.name: Climate Data Store catalogue
dc:URI.description: Catalogued record: Sea level daily gridded data from satellite observations for the Mediterranean Sea from 1993 to 2020

dc:URI.name: Product User Guide and Specification (PDF)
dc:URI.description: Summarises the characteristics of the dataset in a concise manner with focus on: spatial and temporal coverage and resolution; data formats, metadata and flags; description of variables, strengths and limitations.

dc:URI.name: Algorithm Theoretical Baseline Document (PDF)
dc:URI.description: Provides in-depth documentation on the algorithms used to derive the dataset.

dc:URI.name: System Quality Assurance Document (PDF)
dc:URI.description: Describes the processing chain and the procedures in place to assure the quality of the operational service.

dc:URI.name: Product Quality Assurance Document (PDF)
dc:URI.description: Describes the data quality assurance process applied by the data producer before release of the dataset.

dc:URI.name: Product Quality Assessment Report (PDF)
dc:URI.description: Provides the latest report on data quality obtained according to methodologies described in the Product Quality Assurance Document.

dc:URI.name: Target Requirements and Gap Analysis Document (PDF)
dc:URI.description: Summarises the minimum requirements identified for the dataset regarding, among others, data quality, timeliness, and data format, and discusses identified gaps of the dataset with respect to its target requirements.
